segments.text: What should I get Uncle Teddy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could get him a tie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you kidding ? That's the stupidest gift one can buy . I don't want to get a tie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why not ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everybody gets men ties for Christmas . It's too boring . Everybody buys either ties or sweaters . I want a more unique gift .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you can buy him a pet iguana then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a cool idea . At least it would be a surprise.But I'm afraid he wouldn't take care of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He would think you were crazy , Caroline .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . An iguana is too strange for a gift , and a tie is too normal.So I have to find something halfway between .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How much do you want to spend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , he was very good to me.He helped me edit my essay for the scholarship contest.So I want to spend at least 75 dollars .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , I have an idea.You know he carries that conservative-looking briefcase every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , he isn't a lawyer , so I don't think he needs to have a briefcase like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should he have then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think he would appreciate having a very fine leather bag.But more like a workbag or shoulder bag.You know , not so hard and square like a briefcase .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that's a great idea . Men look great with that kind of bag.Where can we buy one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think this mall has a leather goods store.So we have to go to State Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . We can go later then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can buy something for Mom and Dad here , and then go buy Uncle Teddy's gift on State Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good plan . What should we get for Mom though ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She said she wants one of those automatic foot massagers . I think they sell them at Sears .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . We can go check at Sears and see if they have them.And what about Dad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the iguana ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it would be a great joke.But I know we'd have to take the iguana back . And the pet store might not let us.So why don't we get him something else ? Some clothes maybe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A tie ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , shut up about ties ! Forget about ties , why not ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was just kidding .
segments.speaker: S2
